SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT061
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message indicates the SELECT status for each LT at the destination. It is a response to an MT 041 Select Status Request for FIN.
From: GPA or FIN To: User

SystemField.Name: section-number
SystemField.description: Sequential section number, beginning with 0001, to identify the position of an individual message in a multiple-section message.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: section-number
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Sequential section number, beginning with 0001, to identify the position of an individual message in a multiple-section message.

SystemField.Name: total-sections
SystemField.description: Total number of sections in a multi-section message.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: total-sections
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Total number of sections in a multi-section message.

SystemField.Name: value-date-ordering
SystemField.description:
Value date ordering, where:
a) Y = on
b) N = off

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: value-date-ordering
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Value date ordering, where:
a) Y = on
b) N = off

SystemField.Name: subset-sharing
SystemField.description:
Indicates the way in which selected FIN delivery subsets can be shared among multiple logical terminals of a destination, where:
N = subset sharing is not allowed
O = sharing allowed using overflow mechanism
L = sharing allowed using load-balancing mechanism
If this field is not present, then subset sharing is not allowed.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: subset-sharing
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Indicates the way in which selected FIN delivery subsets can be shared among multiple logical terminals of a destination, where:
N = subset sharing is not allowed
O = sharing allowed using overflow mechanism
L = sharing allowed using load-balancing mechanism
If this field is not present, then subset sharing is not allowed

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Subset Sharing value '" + $value + "'.Valid Subset Sharing values are : N,O,L."

SystemField.Name: lt-select-status
SystemField.description:
LT select status, where:
a) YN = input only
b) NY = output only
c) YY = input/output
d) NN = no session

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: lt-select-status
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
LT select status, where:
a) YN = input only
b) NY = output only
c) YY = input/output
d) NN = no session

SystemField.Name: lt-directed-queue
SystemField.description:
Select output of messages from the LT-directed queue, where:
a) Y = yes
b) N = no

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: lt-directed-queue
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Select output of messages from the LT-directed queue, where:
a) Y = yes
b) N = no

SystemField.Name: delivery-subset-list
SystemField.description: Up to 30 delivery subsets can be selected.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: delivery-subset-list
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Up to 30 delivery subsets can be selected.

SystemField.Name: value-date-today
SystemField.description:
Restricts delivery of messages, where:
a) Y = yes. Only deliver messages with a value date of today or earlier
b) N = no. Do not restrict delivery based on value date

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: value-date-today
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Restricts delivery of messages, where:
a) Y = yes. Only deliver messages with a value date of today or earlier
b) N = no. Do not restrict delivery based on value date

SystemField.Name: lt-subsets-shared-flag
SystemField.description:
Whether an LT allows sharing of its selected FIN delivery subsets with other LTs at the same destination, where:
a) Y = yes. Destination operating in shared mode using overflow mechanism.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: lt-subsets-shared-flag
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Whether an LT allows sharing of its selected FIN delivery subsets with other LTs at the same destination, where:
a) Y = yes. Destination operating in shared mode using overflow mechanism.
